unnormalised: Urban planning in India, like in Mumbai or Delhi, faces unique challenges. Consider the impact on local communities and informal settlements. Remember "Nayak" – even a day can't fix systemic issues! The National Institute of Urban Affairs (NIUA) does crucial work. Sustainable solutions are key, balancing growth with cultural preservation and efficient infrastructure like better roads (e.g., 100 km expressway project). This requires inclusive policies, not just flyovers. Also, address the needs of diverse populations.
